title: CSS Animated Link Examples
description: A collection of pure CSS animated link styles featuring various visual effects such as colour changes, underline thickness, background wipes, and highlights, all with smooth transitions.

title: CSS Button Gradient Animation
description: A button with a dynamic, rotating gradient border that animates on hover. It's centred on the page using Flexbox and includes smooth transitions for hover and active states, featuring a scaling effect.

title: CSS Responsive Form
description: Responsive contact form built with HTML and CSS. Includes inline validation hints, required field indicators, and smooth focus states ‚Äî no JavaScript needed.

title: Ghostbusters Logo
description: A hand-traced recreation of the Ghostbusters logo ‚Äî drawn by me in Affinity Designer and animated using pure CSS and SVG only (no GSAP, no JavaScript).

title: Pure CSS X-Men: Cyclops
description: A pure CSS image of Cyclops from the X-Men. This image was inspired by Jag Nagra's Cyclops.

title: Build a Technical Documentation Page
description: This project is a Technical Documentation Page developed for the Responsive Web Design Projects on freeCodeCamp. It features a structured layout with multiple sections dedicated to specific topics and a user-friendly navigation menu.

title: Build a Wikipedia Viewer
description: This project is a Wikipedia Viewer created as part of the freeCodeCamp challenge, 'Build a Wikipedia Viewer'. It enables users to search for Wikipedia articles and view search results through the interface.

title: freeCodeCamp: Build a Survey Form
description: A responsive survey form built for freeCodeCamp's Responsive Web Design certification, collecting user details, preferences and feedback with accessible HTML.

title: freeCodeCamp: Random Quote Machine
description: The Random Quote Machine is a web application developed as part of the freeCodeCamp curriculum. The main goal of this project is to create a simple and interactive page that displays random quotes along with their sources. Users can also tweet their favourite quotes directly from the application.

title: freeCodeCamp: Tribute Page
description: This project was created as part of the 2017 freeCodeCamp curriculum. It uses standard HTML elements and Bootstrap styling.

title: Changing Background on Scroll
description: Dynamic background colour transition on scroll using JavaScript and CSS. The page's background updates to match the data-color attribute of each section as the user scrolls.

title: JavaScript Animated Download Button
description: A button with a ripple effect on click and a downward arrow animation on hover. The ripple is animated with CSS keyframes, and the effect disappears after the animation, while JavaScript handles the ripple creation and cleanup.

title: JavaScript Binary Clock
description: This project is a binary clock implemented using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It displays the current time in a binary format.

title: JavaScript Change String Case
description: A string formatting tool with multiple options. Users can input and convert a string into various formats, such as snake_case, kebab-case, camelCase, or PascalCase. The selected format is applied, and the formatted string is automatically copied to the clipboard.

title: JavaScript Dynamic Hero Search
description: Dark-themed superhero search and filter application using JavaScript. Features real-time search with dynamic table updates.

title: JavaScript Key Codes Keyboard Event Handler
description: A JavaScript event listener captures key presses, displaying the key and keycode in a responsive, text-shadowed display.

title: JavaScript Particle Effect Button
description: An HTML5 canvas and JavaScript button with an explosion effect on click. Particles explode from the button's surface, using its colour data, and the animation is rendered using a custom particle class and canvas.

title: JavaScript Word Count Tracker
description: A simple web application to count the number of words in a textarea, built using HTML, Bootstrap (for the front end), and JavaScript.

title: Random Password Generator
description: This project is a random password generator designed to create unique passwords for users. It provides a user-friendly interface with a 'Generate Password' button, allowing users to easily obtain passwords.

title: Portfolio 2016
description: This project showcases my skills and projects as a business English teacher and coder based in Portugal. The website features various sections including an about me page, portfolio, contact form, and social links.

title: Portfolio 2019
description: My portfolio site from 2019. CSS manages layout, typography, and transitions, while JavaScript controls scroll-triggered visibility and smooth scrolling. The site also includes a contact form with anti-bot measures.

title: GSAP SVG Computer Animation
description: Interactive computer animation using GSAP and an SVG. Features a button that triggers a sequence animating the computer's assembly, complete with scaling, bounce, and staggered effects. Button states include hover, active, and disabled.

title: SVG Canvas Snowfall Animation
description: Holiday-themed site with animated Christmas lights and snowfall effects. CSS handles the festive background colour change and layout, while JavaScript manages the snowfall animation and canvas resizing. title: SVG Vivus Line Drawing
description: An SVG animation of 'Hello World' created using the Vivus library, featuring a 'Restart Animation' button that allows users to replay the animation after it has completed.
